column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////In a perfect world
column2: we would have built a much larger restaurant
column3: but if there's one thing I've learned about this industry after 20+ years
column4: it's that there's no such thing as a perfect restaurant. That said
column5: we work hard to keep the tables turning without letting anyone feel like they're being rushed along. We just want to serve as many Houstonians our ramen as efficiently as we can.
